Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.scenes

Class LeaderCardScene

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.TextScene
it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.scenes.LeaderCardScene
public class LeaderCardScene
extends TextScene
CLI scene used to let the user do a initial/final leaderAction

      card - Target card to be activated
